text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Mm. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On my day off, I'm walking around<n>town one weekend and
run into an<n>unusually cheerful Eishin Flash.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer. I didn't expect to see you<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Just taking notes on the cake shops<n>I've visited today.
They were all<n>excellent in their own way, so I<n>wanted to
write their special traits<n>down while it was fresh in my mind.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Well, as you know, my family runs a<n>cake shop. Back home,
I made a<n>hobby of going around to different<n>stores and
learning about the craft.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It wasn't just about flavor. I'd check<n>interior design, the
variety of cakes<n>offered, location, customer<n>
makeup—fifteen criteria in total.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
So yes, I do like cake, but it would be<n>more accurate to say I
like cake<n>shops.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
There's still another shop on my<n>itinerary. Well, a cafe, not a
cake shop.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's my main destination for<n>today—the Moon Cafe. It's just<n>
around the corner two streets behind<n>you and through the
residential<n>area—about a fifteen-minute walk.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Might be a good chance to get to<n>know her better. We rarely
talk about<n>anything besides training.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...If you have three hours to spare.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I soon learn what she means by that<n>as a long line snaking
towards a<n>certain shop comes into view...
choice_data_list: Wow, just look at that line.
Wow, just look at that line.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Yes, it's a popular cafe, so at around<n>3:35 on a Saturday
there's on<n>average a forty-five minute line.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...I've factored the wait time into my<n>plans, but is that all
right with you?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Okay, well, let's get in line then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We've been in line for ten minutes,<n>and she hasn't spoken
a word... Since<n>we're stuck here, I decide to use the<n>
opportunity to make conversation.
choice_data_list:
So, of the cakes you had today, which did you
like best?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No response—maybe she'd prefer the<n>silence. I consider
apologizing when...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I've decided. My favorite was theSachertorte—a type of chocolatecake—at the fifth shop I visited.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The chocolate fondant was<n>particularly well done. The
texture was<n>a bit firm, but it split apart just right<n>when I bit
into it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Fondant can also be soft, but I prefer<n>it with more of a
crunch.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The tang of theAprikose—apricot—also roundedout the flavors well.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...And that's why it was the best cake<n>I've eaten today. Is
my answer<n>satisfactory?

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: We're ready to seat our next<n>customer.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Already? ...Oh, it's been fifty-five<n>minutes. I'd lost track of
time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Shall we?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Let's call someone over in ten<n>minutes. I've already
decided what<n>I'm getting, but you take your time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Seasonal tarts are what they're<n>known for, so I'll be getting
the<n>seasonal tart and coffee set.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I figure I'll just order the same as<n>her, when an item on the
menu<n>catches my eye.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Could I see?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
"An original cake from our sister<n>store. Not announced
anywhere due to<n>short supply. If you see this, consider<n>
yourself lucky!"

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I see. An original... No, I've already<n>decided on the tart for
today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She always sticks to her plan, and it<n>seems choosing what
to order is no<n>exception. Well, in that case...

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: Are we ready to order?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Oh, um...
choice_data_list: One spécialité set and one tart set.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text: Very good. I'll be right back with your<n>order.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Cafe Staff
text_block_list.text:
Sorry to keep you waiting. One<n>seasonal tart set and our<n>
one-day-only spécialité set.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The spécialité is... a chocolate and<n>caramel two-layer cake.
It's<n>beautifully constructed, almost like an<n>old German
castle...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I'm sure it'll melt in your mouth...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Why are you slicing it in two?<n>It'd be more even if
you<n>centered—wait, you mean half for me?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's why you got the spécialité<n>set? But that's your
order. I couldn't—
choice_data_list: We don't have all day. Here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Ah... Right, well, if you insist.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Mm! It's... rich. Each bite feels so<n>heavy, but not to the point
of being<n>oversweet. It's...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Delicious! It tastes like glücklich...happiness.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
To make it even, you can have half<n>my tart. Hold on, I'll
measure the<n>exact center and—
choice_data_list: Y-you don't have to be so precise.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
No, that won't do. I've got measuring<n>tape, so I can get it
perfect.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: After enjoying our sweet time<n>together...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: That was delicious.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Even more so than I expected. Next<n>time, I'll have to extend
my allotted<n>time by thirty minutes and order<n>another item.
choice_data_list: Glad you had a good time.
Glad you had a good time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...And all because of an unplanned<n>event.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
I mean how we just happened to<n>meet earlier. Without you,
I wouldn't<n>have gotten as much out of coming<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's just... I can't bring myself to<n>admit that the best results
depend on<n>pure coincidence. So instead, my best<n>course
of action is...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Making plans to do another round of<n>visiting cake shops
soon... Would you<n>like to come along?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I'll make a note of it in my<n>schedule.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Well, I think I've managed to get a bit<n>closer to her today.
